name: The Toblerone
description: The Toblerone is a creamy, chocolate flavoured dessert cocktail. Made with Frangelico, Baileys, Kahlua, cream, and honey, the Toblerone cocktail is perfect for dessert or as a sweet treat.
method: Add honey, Frangelico, Baileys, Kahlua, cream, and ice to a blender.

name: Gingerbread Gin Alexander
description: This cocktail is a delicious remix of the classic Alexander cocktail which combines cognac with crème de cacao and cream. The Gingerbread Gin Alexander swaps cognac for gin, to create a creamy cocktail featuring the rich flavour of chocolate liqueur together with the next-level genius that is gingerbread gin.
method: Add ingredients to an ice-filled cocktail shaker.
Shake and then strain into a martini glass.
Garnish with a crumbed ginger biscuit. Enjoy!

name: La Dolce Vita
description: La Dolce Vita is a prosecco-based cocktail with vodka and Campari
method: Add all ingredients except prosecco to a ice-filled wine glass.
Stir well, top with prosecco and garnish with a maraschino cherry.
